TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SubscribeServiceCallback(Type serviceType, object serviceInstance);
.class public auto ansi sealed SubscribeServiceCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SubscribeServiceCallback(serviceType As Type, serviceInstance As Object)
public delegate void SubscribeServiceCallback(Type ^ serviceType, System::Object ^ serviceInstance);
type SubscribeServiceCallback = delegate of Type * obj -> unit

param.name: serviceType
param.span: Der Typ des Diensts, der abonniert wird.

span.span: The type of the service to subscribe to.

param.name: serviceInstance
param.span: Die Instanz des Diensts, der abonniert wird.

span.span: The instance of the service to subscribe to.

summary.span: Stellt einen Delegaten dar, bei dem es sich um einen Rückruf für Dienstabonnements handelt.

span.span: Represents a delegate that is a callback for service subscriptions.
